body: Testing using the example files from the workshop last week to rule out definition error. Installed Dragonfly, MatLab compiler 9.0, and UWG per instructions. When I try to run the UWG component, I get this for a few seconds:  [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/Cmm3f1Muc2aNgXt4r7wpPUelCf1JLjDeYCuowX6BWjmkFeRxaauUuaC3RQR5XqYpc326QOQrPA5sTyJpEiD99Ba31INMAbLb/Error.JPG) And then the simulation stops without running through anything additional in the command prompt than what is above. The EPW file is generated but it is 0kb and empty. I imagine something in my set up is not correct but I haven't the slightest idea what it can be. The is a UWG folder in the AppData/Roaming/Ladybug folder.
